headline: 2 Red-Hot Growth Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: CoreWeave stock has soared following a disappointing IPO.  Robinhood has been riding a bullish wave thanks to its innovations and the resurgence of cryptocurrency trading.  The stock market has rallied in recent weeks as fears of a trade war and a recession have eased.
